title: India vs New Zealand Tests, where to watch live: TV channels and live streaming for IND vs NZ 2024
description: The India-New Zealand Test series begins on October 16 and here’s where you can watch the IND vs NZ 2024 matches live.
author: Sarah Waris
excerpt: The India-New Zealand Test series begins on October 16 and here’s where you can watch the IND vs NZ 2024 matches live.
text: India vs New Zealand Tests, where to watch live: TV channels and live streaming for IND vs NZ 2024 The India-New Zealand Test series begins on October 16 and here’s where you can watch the IND vs NZ 2024 matches live. India take on New Zealand in a three-match series, their last Test outing before the high-profile tour of Australia next month. Currently on top of the 2023-25 World Test Championship table, India will look to consolidate their position and continue their winning streak at home, which has now extended to 18 series wins on the trot. India’s XI for the first Test in Bengaluru is unlikely to have any surprises from the side that played against Bangladesh in Kanpur. However, reports suggest that Shubman Gill has a stiff neck, which could rule him out, with Sarfaraz Khan slotting in. For the visitors, Kane Williamson will be a big miss for the first game. The former skipper has a groin strain, sustained during the second Sri Lanka Test. He has not travelled with the team to India. The Black Caps will also have a new skipper after Tim Southee resigned from the role ahead of the series. Tom Latham, who led the side the last time New Zealand played a Test series in India in 2021, will captain the team. The match could, however, be affected by rain with heavy showers predicted for the first two days of the Test. Light rain is predicted on day three, with the skies expected to clear out on the weekend. However, Bengaluru has excellent drainage facilities and if rain relents, there are unlikely to be prolonged delays. IND vs NZ: Where to watch live on TV and streaming details In India: The match will be shown on TV on Sports 18 1 in English and on the Colors Cineplex channel in Hindi. You can also stream the match live on the Jio Cinema app and website. In New Zealand: Sky Sport 1 will show the match live on TV. In England: TNT Sports 1 will show the series live on TV in the United Kingdom (UK). It can be live-streamed via the Discovery+ app or website. In Pakistan: Tapmad will stream the series live in Pakistan. However, there's no telecast for the series. In the USA: You can watch the matches on Sling TV - Willow TV Other countries: YuppTV Follow Wisden for all cricket updates, including live scores, match stats, quizzes and more. Stay up to date with the latest cricket news, player updates, team standings, match highlights, video analysis and live match odds. Series In Focus
html:
India vs New Zealand Tests, where to watch live: TV channels and live streaming for IND vs NZ 2024

The India-New Zealand Test series begins on October 16 and here’s where you can watch the IND vs NZ 2024 matches live.

India take on New Zealand in a three-match series, their last Test outing before the high-profile tour of Australia next month. Currently on top of the 2023-25 World Test Championship table, India will look to consolidate their position and continue their winning streak at home, which has now extended to 18 series wins on the trot.

India’s XI for the first Test in Bengaluru is unlikely to have any surprises from the side that played against Bangladesh in Kanpur. However, reports suggest that Shubman Gill has a stiff neck, which could rule him out, with Sarfaraz Khan slotting in.

For the visitors, Kane Williamson will be a big miss for the first game. The former skipper has a groin strain, sustained during the second Sri Lanka Test. He has not travelled with the team to India.

The Black Caps will also have a new skipper after Tim Southee resigned from the role ahead of the series. Tom Latham, who led the side the last time New Zealand played a Test series in India in 2021, will captain the team.

The match could, however, be affected by rain with heavy showers predicted for the first two days of the Test. Light rain is predicted on day three, with the skies expected to clear out on the weekend.

However, Bengaluru has excellent drainage facilities and if rain relents, there are unlikely to be prolonged delays.

IND vs NZ: Where to watch live on TV and streaming details

In India: The match will be shown on TV on Sports 18 1 in English and on the Colors Cineplex channel in Hindi. You can also stream the match live on the Jio Cinema app and website.

In New Zealand: Sky Sport 1 will show the match live on TV.

In England: TNT Sports 1 will show the series live on TV in the United Kingdom (UK). It can be live-streamed via the Discovery+ app or website.

In Pakistan: Tapmad will stream the series live in Pakistan. However, there's no telecast for the series.

In the USA: You can watch the matches on Sling TV - Willow TV

Other countries: YuppTV
